## Field.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Field` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(value: T | Sentinel, opt_validator?: FieldValidator<T> | null, opt_config?: FieldConfig);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T \| Sentinel | The initial value of the field. Also accepts Field.SKIP\_SETUP if you wish to skip setup (only used by subclasses that want to handle configuration and setting the field value after their own constructors have run). |
|  opt\_validator | [FieldValidator](./blockly.fieldvalidator_typealias.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that is called to validate changes to the field's value. Takes in a value &amp; returns a validated value, or null to abort the change. |
|  opt\_config | FieldConfig | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of options used to configure the field. Refer to the individual field's documentation for a list of properties this parameter supports. |
